snippet: The Devils, one of the N.H.L. teams embracing advanced statistics, have a department led by Sunny Mehta, who has been a musician, a professional poker player and an author.
abstract: New Jersey Devils, who are not expected to do well in coming season, hope to change course with heavy use of analytics; Sunny Mehta, musician, author, poker expert and long-time Devils fan, heads team's analytics department, compiling data to help organization make best use of players.
lead_paragraph: The Devils, one of the N.H.L. teams embracing advanced statistics, have a department led by Sunny Mehta, who has been a musician, a professional poker player and an author.

headline.main: Devils Go All In on Use of Analytics (a Poker Expert Helps)
headline.print_headline: Devils Go All In on Use of Analytics (Poker Expert Helps)
